title: Exams starting date for first years
content: I'm joining cse this year and wanted to know if say college starts on August 15th, till what date will there be absolutely no tests or exams

comments.body: Dude id think clg is starting until 21st but even if it starts on 15th even then its highly unlikely we'll hv any exams in sept 1st week.
U will prolly have them at least 6 weeks after the start of the semester as that's the plan for 2nd years in the 3 isa system told by our 2nd sem teachers
Worrying about exams even before joining PES lol
